# Waterproof (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]] \[[[Water Spells|water]]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Alchemist Spells|Alchemist 1]], [[1st Level Bard Spells|Bard 1]], [[1st Level Bloodrager Spells|Bloodrager 1]], [[1st Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 1]], [[1st Level Druid Spells|Druid 1]], [[1st Level Magus Spells|Magus 1]], [[1st Level Ranger Spells|Ranger 1]], [[1st Level Shaman Spells|Shaman 1]], [[1st Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 1]], [[1st Level Witch Spells|Witch 1]], [[1st Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 2nd-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 2]], [[BoXM 2nd-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 2]], [[BoXM 2nd-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 2]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** One touched creature, or one touched object of up to 10 lbs/level

**Duration:** 24 hours

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** Elemental Master's Handbook, pg. 14

This spell renders a touched object waterproof for the duration of the spell. The object must be no larger than 10 pounds per caster level. The spell protects the object from any mundane liquids (such as alcohol or oil) but not from magically created liquids.

If this spell is cast on a creature, all of that creatureâ€™s equipment is rendered waterproof as long as it is carried by the target creature. If the creature drops or discards an item, the item is no longer protected by this spell, even if the targeted creature picks it up later.

Mundane combustibles under the effects of this spell still need exposure to air in order to ignite.
